Event.name: Employee_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>The sequence of events in which the <fen>Employee</fen> hires on with an <fen>Employer</fen>, holds a <fen>Position</fen>, and finally leaves the <fen>Position</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Compensation
Arg.definition: <def-root><fen>Compensation</fen> is the payment that the <fen>Employee</fen> receives for performing a <fen>Task</fen>. It often varies over the lifetime of employment.</def-root>

Arg.name: Employee
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person who is obligated to perform some <fen>Task</fen> in order to receive <fen>Compensation</fen>. </def-root>

Arg.name: Employer
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person (or institution) that gives <fen>Compensation</fen> to an <fen>Employee</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Position
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The label given to a particular type of employment.
<ex>Look, I didn't <t>hire</t> on <fex name="Position">as your waitress</fex>!</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Task
Arg.definition:
<def-root>Task identifies the action that the <fen>Employee</fen> is obligated to do for the <fen>Employer</fen>.
<ex>I have a <t>job</t> <fex name="Task">emptying the trash cans</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Field
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Field</fen> in which one works. <ex>He has been <t>working</t> <fex name="Field">in finance</fex> for years.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the amount of time for which the <fen>Employee</fen> continues in employ.</def-root>
